text: Non specific signs such as weight loss , reduced appetite , dehydration , and lethargy also have been reported . A list of other sporadic clinical manifestations described includes : pale mucous membranes , hepatomegaly , jaundice , cachexia , fever , vomiting , diarrhea , chronic nasal discharge , splenomegaly , polyuria / polydipsia , dyspnea , wheezing , abortion and hypothermia .
